name: Light Souls
description:
A parody of Dark Souls made in an emotionally distressed point in my life where I hated video games. Updated to 3.1!

I honestly don't know if the game can work on Mac or Linux only because I have never tried it before. Sorry. It's an exe made out of GameMaker if that helps.

Originally from gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/light-souls-parody-of-dark-souls/41215
